PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_AnnotationLineOfSight
PropertySetDef.Definition: Specifies the properties of the line of sight. For example, it can be used to define the line of sight visibility at the junction between two roads (particularly between an access road and a public road); or in the design of a stadium or theatre.

PropertyDef.Name: SetbackDistance
PropertyDef.Definition: Setback distance from the point of connection on the major element along the axis of the minor element (e.g. distance from a public road at which the line of sigfht is measured.

PropertyDef.Name: VisibleAngleLeft
PropertyDef.Definition: Angle of visibility to the left of the access.

PropertyDef.Name: VisibleAngleRight
PropertyDef.Definition: Angle of visibility to the right of the access.

PropertyDef.Name: RoadVisibleDistanceLeft
PropertyDef.Definition: Distance visible to the left of the access.

PropertyDef.Name: RoadVisibleDistanceRight
PropertyDef.Definition: Distance visible to the right of the access.
